articles.title: Security Upgrades Haven't Slowed Kia And Hyundai Thefts
articles.author: Tom Krisher
articles.excerpt: Security Upgrades Haven't Slowed Kia And Hyundai Thefts
articles.summary:
Nearly three months ago, Hyundai and Kia unveiled software that was designed to thwart an epidemic of thefts of their vehicles, caused by a security flaw that was exposed on TikTok and other social media sites.
So far, it hasn't solved the problem. Across the country, thieves are still driving off with the vehicles at an alarming rate.
Data from seven U.S. cities gathered by The Associated Press shows that the number of Hyundai and Kia thefts is still growing despite the companies' efforts to fix the glitch, which makes 8.

articles.title: Real People in Metal Gear
articles.author: Metal Gear
articles.excerpt: The Metal Gear games have featured a number of real-world celebrities and historical figures. Here are some of the most notable.
articles.summary:
Media will play fast and loose with history if it offers a good story. Lu Bu wasn't as much of a powerhouse in real life as he was in Dynasty Warriors. Like a Dragon: Ishin's RyÅma Sakamoto and Hajime SaitÅ were actually two different people in Bakumatsu Japan. George Washington wasn't dissuaded from becoming 'King' of the USA by a MacGuffin as in Assassin's Creed 3. But it's usually fine, so long as no one takes it seriously.
Most of the time, historical figures appear in the form of some background detail or a cheeky, fourth-wall-breaking Easter egg.

articles.title: Zelda fans already lining up at Nintendo NY for Tears of the Kingdom's launch
articles.author: rawmeatcowboy
articles.excerpt: Waiting in style
articles.summary:
The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is now two days away, and Nintendo fans worldwide are counting down the minutes until launch. Some of those fans happen to be stationed outside Nintendo NY, putting their diehard fan status on display.
 
 
 
Alex CND, who has become famous for standing in lines at Nintendo NY, has made his way to the store for the wait for Tears of the Kingdom. As you can see, others have already gathered outside to watch the minutes tick down, dream about Tears of the Kingdom, and spend time with other dedicated Zelda fans.

articles.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Development Update May Disappoint Fans
articles.author: Hollow Knight: Silksong
articles.excerpt: Developers of the indie title Hollow Knight: Silksong share an update about the game's production that may not be what fans want to hear.
articles.summary:
A new developer update from Team Cherry, the team behind Hollow Knight: Silksong, has recently been shared on social media. Given that many fans have been patiently waiting for the sequel to the popular indie title since it was announced, gamers may not be pleased with what the development team has to share regarding Hollow Knight: Silksong.
Ever since the sequel was revealed in 2019, fans seem to have had high expectations for Hollow Knight: Silksong. This is understandable, given how well-received and successful its predecessor was when it first came out in 2017.

articles.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Release Delayed Because "It's Gotten Quite Big"
articles.author: Mohamed Hassan
articles.excerpt: Hollow Knight: Silksong is now delayed to an undetermined date, but it will be a pretty big experience, according to the team.
articles.summary:
Hollow Knight: Silksong, the highly-anticipated follow-up to the indie smash hit, Hollow Knight, has gotten delayed (via Team Cherry), missing its expected release June 2022 – June 2023 release window as revealed in the latest Xbox showcase, and now fans will likely have to wait a bit longer to get their hands on the game, as a new release date has yet to be announced.
Load Error
Last June, Xbox made a bold gesture of transparency by showcasing games that were expected to hit the shelves soon (as in not much later than when the showcase aired).

On the first day of the 2023 Mid-Season Invitational bracket stage, Gen.G defeated G2 Esports and moved on to the winner's bracket. The first two games were quite one-sided, as Gen.G easily destroyed G2 Esports' Nexus. Games 3 and 4 were closer, and although G2 Esports won game 3, Gen.G came back to take game 4 to seal the deal. After the match, Han 'Peanut' Wang-ho joined Inven for an interview.
You started MSI 2023 with a win. How do you feel?
Load Error
I was a bit worried since we had to play earlier than I thought, but I felt good.

articles.title: Putting AI Shopping Assistants to the Test
articles.author: Marc Bain
articles.excerpt: A new wave of ChatGPT assistants from companies like Shopify and Kering could transform how we shop online. It's unclear how well they actually work, so BoF took them for a spin.
articles.summary:
Casey Lewis, who writes the Gen-Z trendspotting newsletter After School, has spent years fruitlessly searching online for a simple shift mini dress. The closest she's come to her ideal, she said in one newsletter, was an Everlane dress from 2020 that's no longer available.
Recently, she tried a new approach. She asked ShopWith AI, an AI shopping assistant that mixes OpenAI's ChatGPT and proprietary technology, to recommend a black minidress.
'It actually did surface some brands that I'd never heard of before,' Lewis said in an interview.

articles.title: STAAR Practice Test Tips
articles.author: Mark Allinson
articles.excerpt: The STAAR test is coming up, and it can be a stressful time for students. Fortunately, there are some easy STAAR practice test tips that can help students get prepared and ready to rock the exam.
articles.summary:
The 
STAAR test
 is coming up, and it can be a stressful time for students. Fortunately, there are some easy STAAR practice test tips that can help students get prepared and ready to rock the exam. 


Strategy #1: Know your content and key skills


It's important for students to be familiar with the material that they will be tested on. Whether it's the reading passages that they'll read or the math questions that will be asked, it's essential for them to know how to best answer these questions.


A student who knows the subject matter will be able to focus on the test, instead of worrying about what they don't know or what they are struggling with.

According to the latest figures, both Dragon Ball Fighter Z and Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 have shipped 10 million units individually. That's a pretty considerable figure for both games, and it just goes to show the strength of the Dragon Ball brand.

articles.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Will No Longer Launch In The First Half Of 2023
articles.author: Joshua Robertson
articles.excerpt: Hollow Knight: Silksong's launch has been pushed back so Team Cherry can "make the game as good as we can".
articles.summary:
When it comes to highly-anticipated game releases, there aren't many fans out there as ravenous as Hollow Knight players. Silksong has been in development for what feels like an eternity, and combined with a lack of updates from developer Team Cherry, any morsel of official sends the fanbase into overdrive. Even a minor development update is enough to whip up a frenzy, as showcased by Matthew Griffin, a person in charge of marketing and publishing for Hollow Knight: Silksong.
In a tweet earlier today, Griffin updates Hollow Knight fans on how development is faring at the moment, revealing that the title was intially meant to launch in the first half of 2023 but has now been pushed back.

articles.title: Maryland Supreme Court reverses ruling on digital ad tax
articles.author: BRIAN WITTE
articles.excerpt: Maryland's highest court has reversed a ruling by a lower court that the state's first-in-the-nation tax on digital advertising was unconstitutional. In a ruling released Tuesday, the Supreme Court of
articles.summary:
By BRIAN WITTE - Associated Press

ANNAPOLIS, Md. (AP) — Maryland's highest court on Tuesday reversed a ruling by a lower court that the state's first-in-the-nation tax on digital advertising was unconstitutional, saying the court lacked jurisdiction over the case.

In an order, Justice Matthew Fader, the chief justice of the Supreme Court of Maryland, sent the case back to Anne Arundel County Circuit Court with directions to dismiss. He said the plaintiffs failed to exhaust administrative remedies through the state's tax court — Reasons will be stated in a later opinion.

articles.title: Digital Ad Tax
articles.author: Mark Lennihan
articles.excerpt: FILE - A man using a cellphone walks past Google offices on Dec. 17, 2018, in New York. On Tuesday, May 9, 2023, Maryland's highest court reversed a ruling by
articles.summary: Maryland's highest court has reversed a ruling by a lower court that the state's first-in-the-nation tax on digital advertising was unconstitutional. In a ruling released Tuesday, the Supreme Court of Maryland said the lower court lacked jurisdiction over the case because the plaintiffs failed to exhaust administrative remedies. In an order, Justice Matthew Fader, the chief justice of the Supreme Court of Maryland, remanded the case back to Anne Arundel County Circuit Court with directions to dismiss its action for reasons that will be stated in a later opinion.

Despite the fact that in past centuries education and science were not at all accessible to women, who were forced to do housework and raise children, there were many brave 'transgressors' who made great contributions to science and , in general, to humanity, as well as to the present.

articles.title: 競標「賈伯斯親簽5千元支票」 買家搶破頭喊到160萬
articles.author: 陳妍如
articles.excerpt: 蘋果已故創辦人賈伯斯（Steve Jobs）的簽名真跡十分稀少，近日一張由他親筆簽名的早期支票被拿出來拍賣，雖然支票的面額是175美元，但專家此前估計支票至少會以2.5萬美元（約新台幣74萬8465元）售出，結果買家們一路加碼，目前競標價已經被喊到5.3萬美元（約新台幣163萬元）的天價，幾乎是面額的300多倍。
articles.summary:
蘋果已故創辦人賈伯斯（Steve Jobs）的簽名真跡十分稀少，近日一張由他親筆簽名的早期支票被拿出來拍賣，雖然支票的面額是175美元(約新台幣5250元)，但專家此前估計支票至少會以2.5萬美元（約新台幣74萬8465元）售出，結果買家們一路加碼，目前競標價已經被喊到5.3萬美元（約新台幣163萬元）的天價，幾乎是面額的300多倍。
綜合外媒報導，這張支票保存的十分完整，上方標明日期為1976年7月8日，也就是蘋果公司成立的同一年，賈伯斯把這張支票簽給一家位在加州、目前已倒閉的管理諮詢公司「Crampton, Remke & Miller」。報導寫到，由於賈伯斯生前「眾所周知」很不喜歡給人簽名，因此有他親簽的物品很稀少，這張支票的收藏價值可想而知。
拍賣網站上表示，此支票上使用了蘋果公司最原始的名稱「Apple Computer Company」，地址也是蘋果的第一個官方地址，「770 Welch Rd., Ste. 154, Palo Alto」，這是賈伯斯在自家車庫建立蘋果時，用於回信、郵件投遞的地址。
外媒提到，任何關於賈伯斯或是蘋果早期的物品都在拍賣會上標出高價，因為收藏家認為它們極具紀念意義。今年2月，一支第一代iPhone的拍賣價被喊到6.

Simulated Universe in Honkai: Star Rail is a challenge made by Herta to better understand the Aeons of the galaxy. To ensure a fun experience, she installs plenty of things Trailblazers can mess around with, like destructible objects people can destroy along the way.

Load Error

articles.title: 10 Games To Play If You Like Super Mario Bros.
articles.author: Frank Martin
articles.excerpt: There are a lot of games out there like Super Mario Bros. Here are some of the best.
articles.summary:
It's hard to think of a more classic game than the original Super Mario Bros. It had such a simplistic side-scrolling form of gameplay that mixed zaniness with action in the best ways possible. Even as the game grew into the realm of 3D, that fun and wild gameplay still radiated across every level.

It's hard to encapsulate what made those early side-scrolling games so addictive. Although games didn't necessarily copy Super Mario Bros, it's difficult not to see their influence throughout the entire industry.

articles.title: Imran Khan to Face Pakistan Court After Arrest Sparks Violence
articles.author: Faseeh Mangi
articles.excerpt: Pakistan opposition leader Imran Khan will appear at an anti-graft tribunal Wednesday after his dramatic arrest sparked violent clashes and prompted his supporters to protest outside the military's…
articles.summary:
(Bloomberg) -- Pakistan opposition leader Imran Khan will appear at an anti-graft tribunal Wednesday after his dramatic arrest sparked violent clashes and prompted his supporters to protest outside the military's headquarters.
Khan was arrested Tuesday by paramilitary troops on the orders of the National Accountability Bureau, an autonomous anti-graft agency, in relation to a case involving a land deal. He was moved to its headquarters in the garrison town of Rawalpindi for questioning late into the night as angry protests erupted across Pakistan.

articles.title: The essential guide to academic transcription: Choosing the right service for your research and educational needs
articles.author: GoTranscript
articles.excerpt: GUEST OPINION: Over the years, there has been a dramatic paradigm shift in academic subjects and syllabi. Consequently, the approach toward learning and documenting information has also changed.…
articles.summary:
GUEST OPINION: Over the years, there has been a dramatic paradigm shift in academic subjects and syllabi. Consequently, the approach toward learning and documenting information has also changed.
 
 
Nowadays, individuals can record lectures or study group sessions using a smartphone or another device instead of depending on memory or note-taking. Afterwards, they can transcribe the audio manually, use an automated tool, or seek the services of a professional academic transcription service.
 
What Is Academic Transcription, and What Does It Entail?
 
Academic transcription refers to changing recorded educational content, such as lectures, research interviews, or intellectual discussions, into written or digital text format.

Twitter has been working on a lot of changes recently. And while some of them are quite controversial, the company also has some cool features in its plans. On Tuesday, the platform began rolling out an update to its iOS and Android app that brings improvements for sending direct messages (DMs). In addition, Twitter confirmed that it will soon let users make audio and video calls.
 
 
The news was 
shared by Twitter owner Elon Musk
 on his personal profile. According to Musk, the latest version of the Twitter app lets users reply to any message in a thread, not just the most recent one.

articles.title: Couchbase: Setup Distributed Document-oriented NoSQL Database on Kubernetes Cluster — Part 1
articles.author: 8grams
articles.excerpt: Introduction
articles.summary:
Couchbase
NoSQL
, short for 
'Not only SQL'
, is a type of database designed to handle unstructured data. 
Unlike
 traditional relational databases (RDBMS), NoSQL databases can manage data in various formats like key-value, document, column-family, and graph. This flexibility makes NoSQL databases a great choice for modern data-heavy applications and big data analytics.
How is it different from RDBMS?
Let's compare NoSQL databases with traditional RDBMS to see how they stack up:
Data Structure and Management
: RDBMS uses tables with a fixed schema to store data, while NoSQL databases can store data in various formats without a predefined schema.

If a company is able to publish one successful mobile game, they'll sometimes use that success to develop a whole bunch of games really quickly, then just as quickly abandon them when they aren't as successful. They're trying to find their next hit game while their last hit is still bringing in revenue, so they release four or five games the following year hoping something else will take off.

articles.title: Will the iPhone ever support bypassing the battery power while plugged in?
articles.author: Citizen45
articles.excerpt: Macs have a feature where you can bypass the battery power and use the power adapter as the main source of power when plugged in. This significantly improves battery life because the battery isn't…
articles.summary:
Macs have a feature where you can bypass the battery power and use the power adapter as the main source of power when plugged in. This significantly improves battery life because the battery isn't constantly being discharged and re-charged, but rather the power is being provided directly from the electrical outlet. The iPhone (and iPad, for that matter) do not have this feature. Does anyone have any idea if the iPhone could support this feature in the future? 

It would do wonders for battery life, especially for people who use their phone a lot while at a desk or in bed.

The current state of privacy in Australia
 
The Privacy Act was first introduced to Australia in 1988 before the digital age was upon us. Its most recent review occurred in 2020, following recommendations by the ACCC (Australia's competition regulator and national consumer law champion) to address key issues, regarding a digital platforms inquiry in 2019.

articles.title: OpenAI's new Shap-E tool is Dall-E for 3D objects
articles.author: Fionna Agomuoh
articles.excerpt: Shap-E is a model that allows you to generate 3D objects from text, building off OpenAI's other AI tools.
articles.summary:
OpenAI's latest endeavor, Shap-E, is a model that allows you to generate 3D objects from text, not unlike how 
Dall-E
 can create 2D images.


According to OpenAI, Shap-E is 'a conditional generative model for 3D assets. Unlike recent work on 3D generative models which produce a single output representation, Shap-E directly generates the parameters of implicit functions that can be rendered as both textured meshes and neural radiance fields.'




The company's GitHub posting goes on to explain how Shap-E is trained on a combination of mapping 3D assets and a conditional diffusion model.

articles.title: How computer chips made of mushrooms could be the future
articles.author: Alan Truly
articles.excerpt: Future computer chips could be built on top of mushrooms, making a flexible circuit that is environmentally friendly and biodegradable.
articles.summary:
To reduce electronic waste and cut greenhouse gas emissions from plastic, future computer chips might use a substrate made of mushrooms. This isn't 
something out of the Mario Bros. movie, 
either.


That doesn't mean you'll have toadstools mounted on the motherboard. A paper published in the journal 
Science Advances
 (and spotted by 
ZDNet)
 details the process that uses only mushrooms' skin to create a biodegradable base for electronics.




Electronics can get hot in use
, and soldering requires high temperatures, so the fungal substrate was tested and found stable at over 250 degrees Celsius (480 degrees Fahrenheit).

Last year we got the redesigned

Unlike those aforementioned laptops, though, this 15-inch MacBook Air doesn't have me quite as excited. articles.title: The Best Boost Emblems In Pokemon Unite
articles.author: Andrew Scariati
articles.excerpt: Here's everything you need to know about the Boost Emblem system in Pokemon Unite.
articles.summary:
Boost Emblems are Pokemon Unite's spin on the Nature system from the main series. Each emblem has three major components: the stat it increases, which is the boost; the stat it reduces, or the tradeoff; and lastly, its color, which provides a boost when combined with emblems of the same color.

Load Error
Ideally, you want to focus your builds on Boost Emblems that work together to negate tradeoffs, or that further enhance your already powerful abilities. Gold Boost Emblems provide the best bonuses by default, so focus on upgrading your bronze and silver-tier emblems once you settle on the ones that best suit your favorite Pokemon.

Super Mario is Nintendo's flagship franchise, and so there's always a great deal of excitement whenever a new game in the beloved series is revealed to the masses.
Super Mario is an even hotter property than usual thanks to the record-breaking box office success of The Super Mario Bros. Movie. The Super Mario Bros. Movie has sailed past $1 billion at the box office despite releasing to negative reviews, and it seems likely that even more movies based on Nintendo's iconic franchises will be hitting the big screen in the years to come.

articles.title: メタバース技術、2035年までに米ＧＤＰに2.4％貢献＝調査
articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.excerpt: インターネット上の仮想空間「メタバース」は２０３５年までに米国内総生産（ＧＤＰ）に対して最大で年間７６００億ドル（２．４％）のプラス寄与が期待される――。メタ・プラットフォームズの委託を受けてコンサルティング会社デロイトが行った調査でこうした試算が示された。
articles.summary:
［９日 ロイター］ - インターネット上の仮想空間「メタバース」は２０３５年までに米国内総生産（ＧＤＰ）に対して最大で年間７６００億ドル（２．４％）のプラス寄与が期待される――。メタ・プラットフォームズの委託を受けてコンサルティング会社デロイトが行った調査でこうした試算が示された。

調査によると、国防や医療、製造業といった分野でメタバースの技術が活用されるほか、ビデオゲームや対話など娯楽市場からも経済効果がもたらされそうだ。

カナダの年間ＧＤＰについても、３５年までに４５３億カナダドル（３３８億８０００万米ドル）から８５５億カナダドルのプラス寄与が見込まれるという。

メタが昨年コンサルティング会社アナリシス・グループに委託して策定されたリポートでは、メタバース技術が世界全体のＧＤＰを３１年までに３兆０１００億ドル押し上げるとの見積もりも明らかにされている。
